content:
Aakaasham bhesunnavane-bhesi kanyakayaam mariyaam
Vandanamelishubaakkothaan-yeehoodaa parvvathameri.
Elishubaa kushalam kellkke-kartthaavetthiyathortthu mudaa
Maathaavinnudaram thannil yoohaanonaahlaadichu.
Kanyakayodu roohaa moolam-vandhya villichu paranyevam
Penmanimaaril bhaagyavathee!-dhanyamaho! Nin garbhaphalam
Kartthaavinnamme! Varika - ninnaagamanam mamgallamaam
Naathhan maathaavotthu varaan-bhaagyamenikkengundaayi.
Maathaavinkooden kartthan-than ghoshakane darshippaan
Saubhaagyam me nalkiyathaar?-sthuthiyennennum sarvveshaa!
